title: (draft) Add new indicator - ZLEMA - Zero Lag Exponential Moving Average

<!--- Provide a general summary of your changes in the Title above -->

#### Description
<!--- Describe your changes in detail -->

Implement new indicator - ZLEMA - Zero Lag Exponential Moving Average

#### Related Issue
#8118

#### Motivation and Context

The Zero Lag Exponential Moving Average (ZLEMA) indicator was developed by John Ehlers and Ric Way. The objective is to eliminate the inherent lag associated with all trend following indicators such as averages.

#### Requires Documentation Change
<!--- Please indicate if these changes will require updates to documentation, and if so, specify what changes are required -->
Doc for this indicator should be created

#### How Has This Been Tested?

comparison with talipp computation of ZLEMA(5) of SPY close prices
